name: A Walking Simulator About My Cat
name_original: A Walking Simulator About My Cat
description:
CW: References to animal death.

This is my first Unity game, made over roughly four days for class (i.e. it's very rough).

Even if we don’t have him in our lives anymore, he’ll always be with us — in the rooms of our house, in our photos, in our memories.

I made this so you could walk through our home and get a taste of what it was like to have him in our lives.

I’m incredibly grateful for the people who were there for me during this time. You know who you are, and I send a million thanks to you.

Controls and Tips:

Use WASD to move and Space to jump. Press E when prompted to interact. 

Some objects are one-sided, and some sounds are quiet.
